item.title: Devil May Cry 3
item.description: Devil May Cry 3: Dante’s Awakening, originally released for the PlayStation 2 in 2005, is a stylish action game developed and published by Capcom. It’s the prequel to the critically acclaimed Devil May Cry series, delving into the origin story of the series’ iconic protagonist, Dante, a half-demon, half-human monster hunter. The game throws players into a thrilling adventure as Dante confronts his power-hungry twin brother, Vergil, who seeks to open a portal to the demonic world, Temen-ni-gru.
